DefaultEvent.Description: Parents nuzzle their pups farewell, holding back the tears just long enough. The conscripts waddle towards the training camp in hastily made, ill-fitting armour.
DefaultEvent.Name: Unhappy soldiers

ChildBranches.Name: Suggest they raise conscription
ChildBranches.Description: It will be unpopular, but safety must come first.

DefaultEvent.Description: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$The aide bows, defeated. "As you say, Hairless Advisor." The attacks continue, growing stronger as the pirates realise how little resistance [q:Pigmote Isle: Mastery] can muster.
DefaultEvent.Name: Acceptable losses?

ChildBranches.Name: Recommend they accept the loss
ChildBranches.Description: $[Ss]cintillack -> シンティラック$The scintillack harvesters will have to work harder to make up the shortfall.

SuccessEvent.Description: The raiding party returns bearing treasure and the lead pirate's head. Her successor will think twice before launching another attack.
SuccessEvent.Name: Victory!

DefaultEvent.Description: Pigmote sends its best soldiers against the pirates. Only one returns. On a silver platter. Coated in a honey glaze.
DefaultEvent.Name: Defeat!

ChildBranches.Name: Advise an attack on their stronghold
ChildBranches.Description: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$The pirates must learn that [q:Pigmote Isle: Mastery] will fight back.

Description: $[Ss]cintillack -> シンティラック$The aide takes you to the coast, where the huts still smoulder from the last pirate attack. "Those beastly raiders keep coming for our precious scintillack," it squeaks, shaking a paw in impotent furry rage. "How can we protect our shores, Hairless Adviser?"
Name: $Pigmote Isle -> ピグモート・アイル$A Dilemma On Pigmote Isle
